Ok, that became messed up. Let's try again:

Typical for Unreal Engine 3 games I think. Mass Effect is the same for example.

It's here:

Just wondering about the system requirements. Also, this torrent is made up of one exe file and three .pak files. Can someone let me know how to extract the game from the exe file and .pak files? i ran the 4 gig .exe file as administrator, but all it did was make windows hang, any ideas?

the torrent has one 4 gig exe file and three .pak files, does anyone know how to extract the ISOs or install the game with this torrent? the huge exe file just hangs my computer.
